Class OrderLinkedRedBlackTree.Node<T>

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    OrderLinkedRedBlackTree<T>

    public static class OrderLinkedRedBlackTree.Node<T>
extends RedBlackTree.Node<T>
    A red-black tree node augmented to store pointers to its predecessor and successor.
    Author:
    Kevin L. Stern
